name: day8
description: *Question:* Create two separate files. In the first file, define and export two functions: calculateArea (calculates the area of a rectangle given its width and height) and calculatePerimeter (calculates the perimeter of a rectangle given its width and height). In the second file, import both functions and use them to calculate the area and perimeter of a rectangle with a width of 5 and a height of 10. Print the results to the console.
